data.title: Wipro on LinkedIn: Wipro is honored to have sponsored American India Foundation’s 2024 Bay…
data.meta_description: Wipro is honored to have sponsored American India Foundation’s 2024 Bay Area Gala. AIF is dedicated to improving the lives of India’s underprivileged, with a…
data.text:
We’re thrilled to announce that Wipro is back at the Medicaid Enterprise Systems Conference 2024, ready to showcase our cutting-edge solutions designed to revolutionize Medicaid Enterprise Systems. Join us at Demo Room #L008 for an exclusive opportunity to experience these innovations firsthand. Details here: https://bit.ly/3zINTSp Stay tuned for more updates! #MESC2024 #Medicaid #HealthcareIT

Discover the future of Trust and Safety at TrustCon 2024 in San Francisco, CA, from July 22-24! Join us at Wipro's booth (#4) for live demos and in-depth discussions with our industry-leading experts. Don't miss the Plenary Session on July 24 at 9:20 AM on the transformative potential of Gen AI in Trust and Safety. Explore groundbreaking ideas and platform innovations tackling misinformation, deepfake and disinformation. Learn more: https://bit.ly/4cwzYxB #TrustCon2024 #TrustCon #TrustandSafety #GenAI #AI #Wipro #Moderation #Innovation #ContentModeration #DigitalSecurity

Those looking to make a difference with their work will find incredible opportunities at Wipro. We caught up with Jennifer Neha Sodha (MBA, MS), Client Partner - Life Sciences and Medical Devices unit, who shared how the possibility of creating an impact shaped her journey with us. Want to do meaningful work every day? Explore: https://bit.ly/2QSwNYN #ReinventYourWorld #OneWipro #AmbitionsRealized

For capital markets, data monetization is the key to unlocking new revenue opportunities, yet success demands tailored strategies that address product identification, cultural shifts, and regulatory compliance. Wipro experts break down how to navigate these challenges, with tips for how firms can leverage their unique data assets to deliver value to both providers and consumers. https://bit.ly/3zBoqKJ #WiproConsulting #DataMonetization #OneWipro

Wipro is thrilled to be sponsoring the Reuters - Momentum AI Summit, July 16-17, 2024, in San Jose. Now is the time to ignite your momentum towards AI-powered business transformation. Nagendra Bandaru, President and Managing Partner of Enterprise Futuring at Wipro, will be participating in a recorded executive interview on unlocking the power of AI to drive large-scale business transformation, Wednesday, July 17, at 9:30 AM local time. Join us at the Reuters - Momentum AI Summit to learn more about how we are shaping the future of AI together. Empower your enterprise with Wipro ai360 AI services. https://bit.ly/3RDLbkk #GenAI #AI #Wipro #ReutersMomentum #AI #Innovation #TechLeaders #BusinessTransformation #AIConference #ReutersEvents

Join us in Las Vegas for Oracle CloudWorld 2024 and experience cutting-edge cloud solutions and accelerators to drive your business transformation. Learn from client success stories and discover actionable strategies for harnessing the power of cloud technology with Wipro and Oracle. Visit our event page for more info and to schedule a meeting with our experts. https://bit.ly/3xGzJR8 Stay tuned for updates about our presence at the event and get ready to unlock the full potential of cloud with Wipro and Oracle. See you there! #OracleCloudWorld #CloudTransformation Deviprasad R. Balasubramanian Ramalingam Sara Safa Krubashini Prasad Uwe Nonnenmann Unnikrishnan Menon Lalit Mongia Parthi Doraiswamy Koteswara Rao Gali Nitin Kapoor Divya Shubham

We’re thrilled to announce that Wipro’s Topcoder and Lab45 are partnering to revolutionize the design and development of custom AI agents and assistants. The Wipro Lab45 AI Platform leverages cutting-edge Generative AI, machine learning, and deep learning technologies to drive efficiencies and transform business functions. With over 1,000 GenAI agents and more than 10 applications, the platform offers no-code and low-code solutions for HR, sales, marketing, operations, and various other enterprise areas. Topcoder (a Wipro company) has launched its first conversational intelligent solution delivery platform. The platform connects clients to a global talent network of 2 million software developers, data scientists, designers and QA experts. Our custom AI assistant helps clients define their requirements, launch work to the right talent immediately, and automatically review talent-submitted solutions. Join us at the Ai4 conference to learn more about our groundbreaking partnership and how we are shaping the future of AI together. https://bit.ly/4eXWQYi
